batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ls')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-childitem')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('gci'))) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-recurse')) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.pass')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.kdbx')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.kdb'))))
